column5: Flying back from Thailand yesterday I had a 15 hour flight from Doha to Chicago which just sucks. On the last 2 hours as I was looking at the flight map and just amazing how many lakes there are in Canada and I was thinking how many are never fished and what monsters could be in them. Just so impressive on what a fishery and resource this is.
Let's try and hit all of them,cross off the bad ones!

Tried it when we were younger.We threw dart at map north of where I lived.so only threw dart north of CNR tracks.Getting into some lakes was a workout but 99% of them had fish.It was some awesome adventures we had.Float plane would of been easier but no boats so we just cut our way in.
Nice to be young and full of energy.

My dad went to Lac Seul in the late 50's when he was a teen. Friends he met there (and still maintains) tell about their grandfather canoeing the length of the lake many years before. Imagine what an adventure that would have been.
